adjective.description: Of or relating to the subclass Phyllocarida (class Malacostraca) of crustaceans, characterized by broad, flat limbs.

noun.description: A malacostracan crustacean of the subclass Phyllocarida.

origin: Late 19th century. From scientific Latin Phyllocarida, subclass name from phyllo- + ancient Greek καρίς shrimp, prawn.
